146079:0:  te:   sataH sajjAyate iti sANKyAH. vivftaYcEtadutpattiSabde
146080:2:  te:    ca liNdeH kAryyatvenApUrvavAcakatA taTA gurumata pradarSane Sabdaci0 uktaM yaTA “aTa KargakAmoyajetetyAdO izwasADanatvaM kAryatvaM vA yadviDiH samaBivyAhftakriyAnvayI tadanyAnvayI vA. tatra guravaH nAhatya kriyA kAryyatayA liN boDayituM Sakyate svargakAmaniyojyAnvayayogyatAjYAnavirahAt kAmanAviSizwasya hi mamedaM kAryyamitibodDftvaM niyojyatvaM tat kAmanAyAstadboDopayoge sati Bavati. sa ca kAmanAnantaraM kAmyasADanatAboDAt kAryyatAboDe sati syAt evaYca svargasADanatAboDe sati svargakAmaniyojyAnvayayogyatA. na ha kAlAntaraBAvisvarge kriyA sAkzAt paramparayA vA sADanamiti SabdoboDayitumarhati ASuvinASitvAt paramparAGawakAnupasTitestftIyaprakArABAvAt anyaTA tamAdAya sADanatvasamBavAt kalpyamapyapUrvaM na syAt izwasADanatA viDipakze sPuwEvAnupapattiH kAryyatAviDipakze'pi anvaya prakAratayA sADanatvaM SABdamiti Palato na viSezaH. ataH kriyAto'nyat KargasADanatArhaM kriyAkAryyatAnirvAhakaM liNadyarTaH.“ vyAkfYcEtat maTurAnATena-- “prasaNgAdapUrvasya viDipratyayavAcyatAM praBAkarABimatAM nirAkarttuM vicArANgasaMSayAprayojikAM vipratipattimAdarSayati aTetyAdinA yadviDiH yadviDipadopasTApitArTaH. samaBivyAhftakriyAnvayIti etadviDisamaBivyAhftaDAtUpasTApitArTAnvayI tadanyAnvayI vetyarTaH tadanvayitvaYca tadviSezyakatvAvacCinnaSAbdaboDaprakAratASrayatvam. atra viDikowiH, viDeH kAryyatve SaktivAdinAM nEyAyikAnAM, tannaye svargakAmakftisADyo yagAityanvayAt, nizeDakowistu kAryatvarUpeRApUrve SaktivAdinAM prABAkarARAM, tannaye svargakAmasya yAgavizayakaM kAryyamiti yAgavizayakakAryavAn svargakAma ityeva vAnvayaboDAt atra vizayakatvaM janyatvaM tacca yAgakAryayoH saMsargaH. kAryatvaM kftisADyatvam apUrvasyApi kvacillakzaRAdinA DAtUpasTApitatvAcca viDikowO sidDasADanaM nizeDakowO bADa iti tadvAraRAya etadviDi samaBivyAhftetiDAtuviSezaRam. tadanyAnvayitvaYcatadanvayiBinnatvaM yaTASrutasya viroDikowitvABAvAt. izwasADanatvAdinA pratyekarUpeRa pakzatve dvayorasaMgrahaH. izwasADanatAviDipakze izwasADanatvasyApi viDyarTakArye'nvayAdataH pakze yadviDiriti. itTaYca yadviDyarTatvena dvayoranugamAnnoktadezaH izwAsADanatvaM kAryatvaM veti tu svarUpakaTanaM na tu tadrUpeRa pakzepraveSaH izwasADanatvamiti prABAkarEkadeSimate. kAryatvaMkftisADyatvam. na ca gurunaye kAryasya DarmiRo viDyarTatayA kftisADyatvarUpasya kAryatvasya viDipratyayapravfttinimittatvameva kuto viDyarTatvamiti vAcyaM kAryasya viDyarTatve'pi avacCedakaviDayA kAryatvasyApi viDyarTatvAt. vastutastu tanmate kftisADyatvarUpaM kAryatvaM na SakyatAvacCedakam api tu prAgaBAvapratiyogitvarUpaM DvaMsapratiyogItvarUpaM DarmatvarUpaM vA lAGavAt. kftisADyatvantu pfTageva SakyaM liNsAmAnyaSakyaM vA pacetetyAdilOkikasTalAnuroDAt. anvayaboDo'pi yAgavizayakaM kAryaM svargakAmakftisADyamityAkArakaH, kftisADyayAgavizayakakAryavAn svargakAma ityAkArakoveti yaTASrutaeva sADuH. pakzatAvacCedakAvacCedena viDikowi sidDeruddeSyatayA balavadanizwAnanubanDitvasya prakftyarTe'nvayamAdAya nAMSataH sidDasADanaM na vA kftisADyatvezwasADanatvayoranyataratrAMSataH sADyasidDimAdAyArTAntaratvam. pravarttakajYAnaprakArIBUtatvena viDyarTo viSezaRIyaH, tena varttamAnatvAdeH kAlasya saMKyAyASca tAdfSaviDipratipAdyatve'pi na tatra viDikowAvaMSato bADaH. na cezwasADanatvatvAdO biDyarTa tAvacCedakeM'Sato bADaH, pravarttakajYAnaprakArIBUtatvasya pravfttiviSezyAMSe pravarttakajYAnaprakAratvarUpatvAt. yadvA saMKyAkAlAtiriktatvena viDyarTo'pi viSezaRIyaH. viDiSakyatvarUpasya viDyarTatvasya pakzatAvacCedakatvAdizwasADanatvatvAdO nAMSatobADaH. kftisADyatvasya pfTak SakyatayA nEtadasaMgrahaH nizeDasidDistu pakzatAvacCedakasAmAnADikaraRyena uddeSyA nAtobaladanizwAnanuvanDitveM'Sato bADaH. pravarttakajYAnaprakArIBUtatvamAtreRa pakzatAyAm odanakAmaH pacedityAdiviDyarTe vijYAtaviDitattvArTastu tadanvayinaM pfcCati aTeti na tu vipratipattiparo'yaM granTaH guruRA samaM vivAde tu kAryyatvaM viDipratyayaSakyatAvacCedakaM naveti vipratipattirUpahanIyA viDikowiH. parezAm. naca kAryasya viGipratyayaSakyatve'pi tasya prakftyarTayAgAdAvaBedAnvaye'pi nEyAyikAnAM vivakzitArTasidDyA'rTAnvaraprasaNga iti vAcyaM DAtvarTapratyayArTayoraBedAnvayaboDasyAvyutpannatayA tAdfSaboDAsamBavAt. anyaTA vipratipattAvapi yAganizWakftisADyatvasya nirUpakatAsambanDena viDyarTe kftAvanvayAdapi nEyAyikAnAM vivakzitArTasidDyA'rTAntaraprasaNgasya durvAratvAditi prAhuriti dik. atra gurava iti atra vipratipattO praSne vA. nAhatyeti Ahatya--sAkzAt apUrvakAryyatvAnupapattijYAnadvArA paScAtta boDyataeveti BAvaH. kriyA--yAgAdiH, kAryatayA svargakAma kftisADyatayA. nacEvam anupapattijYAnottarakAlikaboDamAdAya viDO sidDasADanaM nizeDe ca bADa iti vAcyaM tadanvayitvasya SAbdatvaGaditatvAdeva sidDasADanAdinirAsAt anupapattijYAnottarakAlikaboDasyEva OpAdAnikaboDatvena SAbdatvavirahAt. anupapatteH sAkzAtparamparOdAsInyena PalasADanatvAnvaye'pi PalaparyyantasTAyitvatAdfSavyApAropaDAyakatvAnyataratvasya yogyatAtvena tajjYAnaM vinA sAmAnyato'pi sADanatvAnvayA samBavAt iti BAvaH. atrEvAnupadaM nanu sajAtIya iti na ca sAkzAt paramparAsADanatvoBayasADAraRaM KargasADanatvamanugatameva durvacamiti vAcyaM KargatvAvacCinnavijAtIyasvarganiyatapUrvavarttitAvacCedakAnyaTAsidDyanirUpaka paramparAsADanatvasyApUrvanizWasADanatAGawitatvAt. na ca kAryyavat sAkzAt sADanatvasyApi viDyarTatayA tasya ca samAnapadopAttatayA kAryya evAnvayAdapUrvasya svargasADanatvAvagama iti vAcyaM taTApi kAryyamAtrasya viDyarTatvapakze'pratIkArAdityata Aha kAryyatAviDipakza iti. kAryyatvamAtrasya viDipravftti nimittatvapakze ityarTaH mAtrapadAdizwasADanatvamAtrasya vyavacCedaH tena saMKyAderviDyarTatve'pi na kzatiH. kftisADyatvasya pfTakSakyatvapakze kAryya mAtrasya viDiSakyatvapakze'pItyarTaH. mAtrapadAdizwasADanatvavyavacCedaH. anvayaprakAratayeti kftisADyatvAnvayaprayojakarUpatayetyarTaH. sADanatvaM padAnu pasTitamapi svargasADanatvaM Gawena jalamAharetyAdO apadArTasyApi cCidretaratvasya BAnavaditi BAvaH. yadyapi apUrbbe kftisADyatvAnvayaboDe svayamupasaMharati ata iti svargasADanatArhamiti sAkzAtsvargasADanatvasyAnvayayogyamityarTaH. kriyAkAryatAnirvAhakamiti kAryyopasTitirizwasADanatAjYAnaM tataH kftiriti praRAlyA kriyAyAH kfti sADyatAnirvAhakatvamityarTaH liNAdyarTa iti AdipadAttavyAdiparigrahaH.“ SabdacintAmaRO sTAnAnatare gurumante vEdikaliNAdeH kAryatvenApUrvavAcakatA SaNkApUrbbakaM darSitA yaTA. “nanvapUrve vyutpattivirahaH taTA hi prasidDArTe svargapadasamaBivyAhArAnyaTAnupapattyopasTite SaktirgrahItavyA na ca SAbdAnuBAvat pUrvamapUrvamupasTitaM mAnABAvAt apUrvatvavyAGAtAdavAcyatvApAtAcca. na ca liNAdinA tadupasTitiH vyutpattyanantaraM tatpravfttAvanyonyASrayAt. na ca kAryyatvenopalakzite tatra SaktigrahaH upalakzaRaM hi smAraRamanumApanaM vA agfhIte sambanDAgrahAt aSakyamiti? mEvam kArye DarmiRi kAryatvena SaktigrahAt kAryatvaviSizwaYcopasTitameva tatonvitABiDAnadaSAyA yAgavizayakaM kAryamityanuBavaH svargakAmAyogyatayA GawAdikaM tiraskftya kriyABinne yogyatAvaSAdyAgavizayakApUrve paryavasyati, natvapUrvatvena Saktigraho na vA'pUrvaM kAryamityanuBavaH Bavati ca sAmAnyataH sambanDsudDiH sahakArivaSAdviSezabudDvuyupAyaH yaTAtavEva kartfmAtrasambanDagrahAt kartfviSezasidDiH. nanu kAryatvenApi kiM GawAdO SaktigrahaH utApUrve uBayatra vA? nAdyaH, anyapratipattAvanyaSaktigrahAnupayogAt. nAntyO, prAganupasTiteriti cet? na yenahi rUpeRa SabdenAnuBavo janyate tena rUpeRa SaktigrahaH padArTa smaraRaYca SabdAnuBavahetuH. nahi prameyatvena SaktigrahaH padArTasmaraRaYca Gawatvena SAbdAnuBavahetuH. evaYca GawAdAveva kArye Sakto liNiti SaktigrahaH tataH kAryamiti smaraRaM tato yogyatAdivaSAt pracaraddravyaguRakarmARi kAryARi vihAya yAga vizayakaM kAryamityanuBavo BavannapUrvamAlambate yogyatvAcca tasya sTAyitvalABaH. ata eva vAkyArTAnuBavamAtravizayatvAttadapUrvam. na ca smftAnAmAkANkzAdivaSAdanvayaboDaH padena kriyate, nacApUrvaM smftigocara iti vAcyaM? SaktigrahapadArTasmaraRaSAbdAnuBavAnAM samAnaprakArakatAmAtreRa hetuhetumaNgAvAvaDAraRAt lAGavAdAvaSyakatvAcca. naca kvacit sahacAramAtreRAnvayapratiyogina evopasTitistaTA, gOravAt, gopadAdapUrvagavAnanuBavaprasaNgAcca, viSizwavESizwyaboDe sarvatra taTEva, anyaTA parvatIyavahnirvyApakatayA nAvagata iti kaTaM tadanvayo'numitO. nanu sAmAnyalakzaRayA pratyAsattyA sarvAeva vyaktayo vyAptigrahe Saktigrahe dca vizayI Bavanti kaTamanyaTA parvatIyaDUmavyAptyagrahe tasma. danumitaH? iti cet, na, yena rUpeRa vyAptigrahastena rUpeRa vyApyatvena vA pakzaDarmatAgraho'numitO kAraRamastu kintayA. api ca sA yadyasti mamApi, nAsti cettavApi. kiYca tava darSane nAstIti sutarAmapUrvavAcyatA kAryatvena hi rUpeRApUrvasyApi SaktigrahavizayatvaM padArTasmftivizayatvaYca. nacEva mapUrvatvakzatiH yAgavizayakatvAderviSezasya kArye liqaM vinAnupasTiteH yaTA parvatIyatvamAnaM vahnO, nAnumitiM vinA. nanu yadi kArye kriyAsADAraRe liNSaktiH kriyA cAyogyeti yogyApUrvalABaH tadA nityanizeDApUrvayoralABaH na hi tatrAyogyatayA kriyA tyaktuM Sakyate PalASravaRAt kalpanAyAYca vIjABAvAt nacekatra nirRItaH SAstrArTaH paratrApi taTEveti nyAyAttatrApyapUrvameva liNAdyarTa iti yuktaM nahyapUrvatvena SaktigrahaH kintu kAryatvaviSizwe DarmiRi, kriyA ca taTA Bavatyeva, na ca kAryeRa samaM kriyAnvayAnupapattyA'pUrve paryavasAnamaBedasyApyanvayatvAditi mEvam na hi loke pacetetyAdO kArye DarmiRi SaktiH kalpitA kintvananyalaByakftirUpe kAryatvamAtre, DarmiRaH pAkAderDAtorevopasTitisamBavAt kriyAkAryatAnvayasyAnvitABiDAnalaByatvAt taTA ca DarmiRi Saktirvede kalpanIyA sA ca kriyAnirAsenEva, na hi kriyAyAH kAryatvAnvayayogyatvena DarmiRi SaktiH kalpayituM Sakyate tasmAdayogyatayA kriyAnirAsAnantaraM tadatirikta eva SaktikalpanaM na hi kriyAtiriktakAryAt kAryamAtraM laGu tataH kriyApi SakyEveti vAcyaM yato na brUmaH kriyAtiriktakAryatvena SaktiH kintvayogyatayA nirastAyAM kriyAyAM DarmiRi Saktikalpanasamaye yatkriyAtiriktaM tatra SaktiH na tu Saktigrahe kriyAtiriktatvapraveSaH na hi yatprayuktAnupapattyA yat kalpanaM tadeva tasya vizayaH evaYca kAryatvenApi tadatirikta eva SaktikalpanA. nityanizeDayorapi tadevopAsanAdyanvayayogyaM liNA'BiDIyate na tu kAryatvamAtre DarmiRi bADakABAvAt lakzaRAprasaNgAcca. GawAdistu liNgaSaktigraheRa tiraskriyate na vA puraskriyate uBayaTApi gOravAt anvitABiDAna daSAyAM tvayogyatayA tasyApraveSaH. viDipratyayasya ca tatrAprayogaH kevalasya tasyAsADutvAt DAtusamaBivyAhAre ca tadarTenAnvayaboDajanananiyamena GawAdyapratipAdakatvAt ataevAprayogAdevAprayogo'pUrbbatvaM vA prayogopADiriti vadanti. aTApratipAdyameva GawAdivfttitayA na kAryatvaM pravfttinimittaM pratipAdyamAtravfttereva taTAtvAt anyaTA prameyatvameva taTAstviti cet na, yatprakArikA hi pratipattiH padajanyA tadeva tatra pravfttinimittaM PalabalakalpyatvAcCakteH natu pratipAdyamAtravfttiH sAsnAtvAdO vyaBicArAt na ca prameyatvaM taTA, tadboDasyApravarttakatvAt ataeva loke liNlAkzaRikI, kriyABinne DarmiRi vede, SaktikalpanAt. na ca lOkikAnAmapUrve tAtparyyaM samBavati pUrvaM pramARAntareRA pratIteH. kriyAsADAraRaSaktAvapi loke lakzaREva pacetetyatra hi pAkakAryatAvagamyate tatra kAryatve liNastAtparyaM lAGavAt na DarmiRi, kriyAyA DAtulaByatvAt tadAhuH “tAtparyAdDi vfttirna vfttestAtparyamiti“. tftIyAyAH karaRatvEkatvavat kAryaM kAryatvaYca na svatantraM SakyaM kintu viSizwaM  viSezyAcca viSezaRamanyadeveti kAryatve lakzaRA na ca kAryatvaviSizwaDarmyupasTitAvapi DarmyaMSamapahAya kriyayA kAryyatAnvayo'stu kiM lakzaRayeti vAcyaM nahItaraDarmigatatvenopasTitasya DarmyantarAkANkzAsti ataH svatantrakAryopasTitaye lakzaRA yaTA “puroqASakapAlena tuzAnupavapati“ ityatra puroqASArTatayA tadanvitatvenopasTitasya kapAlasya nopavApAkANkzeti svatantrakapAlopasTitaye'DizWAne lakzaRA. na ca vyutpattiviroDaH na hi loke kriyAkAryatvena SaktiravaDAritA yena viroDI Bavet kintu kAryatvamAtre, kriyAyA DAtulaByatvAt, na ca Darmyantare SaktAvapi tadBaNgaH. tasmAt prakftyarTAnvitasvArTaboDakatvaM pratyayAnAM gfhItapratyayArTaM vA'pUrvamapItina viroDaH. astu vA loke liNaH kriyAkAryatve SaktiH taTApi tadBaNgaM vinEva nAnArTanyAyena vede DarmyantareSaktiH tAM vinA svargakAmAnvayAsamBavAt“.  vyAkftaYcedaM maTurAnATena yaTA-- “vyutpattiviraha iti viDeH SaktigrahAsamBava ityarTaH samaBivyAhArAnupapattyeti tadupasTApitasya svargakAmanAvato yAge kftisADyatvAnvayAnupapattyetyarTaH. grahItavyetyagreRAnvayaH. nanvanyaTAnupapattyA janmAntarIyasaMskArAdeva tadupasTitiH kalpanIyetyata Aha apUrbbatvavyAGAtAditi SAbdaboDAt pUrvaM pramARAntarAvizayatvasyEvApUrvarUpatvAditi BAvaH. nanu sannapi yogArTo'tra tyajyate maRqapapadavadityasvarasAdAha avAcyatve'pi. prakArAntareRApUrvasyopasTitO tadvAcyatvaM vinApi taddvArA janakatvaniScayasamBavAditi BAvaH. tat pravfttO--liNAdinA'pUrvopasTitO. apUrbbatvenopasTitiH prAk nAstItyASayenASaNkate na ceti. --upalakzite upasTite. smAraRaM liNAdinA smAraRAm. gUQABisanDiH samADatte mEvamiti. kAryye DarmmiRIti kAryyAtASraye DarmmiRItyarTaH. kAryyatvaviSizwaYceti GawAdO viSezaH yAgavizayakaM kAryyamiti svaragasADanamiti SezaH. svargakAmeti svargasADanatvAnvayAyogyatayetyarTaH. viSezabudDayupAya iti sAmAnyarUpeRa viSezabudDayupAya ityarTaH. sambanDagrahAt kftsambanDagrahAt karttfviSezeti paktetyAdO pAkakartftvAdinA viSezasidDirityarTaH. aBisanDimudvAdayituM SaNkate nanviti. anupasTiteriti apUrbbasya prAganupasTiterityarTaH. yena hIti SaktigrahapadArTasmaraRaSAbdAnuBavAnAM samAnaprakAratvenEva kAryyakAraRaBAvaH na tu samAnavizayakatvenApi gOravAdityarTaH. nanu samAnavizayakatvenEva kAryyakAraRaBAvo na tu samAnaprakArakatvenetyata Aha nahIti. padArTasmaraRaYca--prameyattvena padArTasmaraRaYca taTAca samAna prakArakatvasyAvaSyakatvAttenEva rUpeRa hetutvamiti BAvaH. smaraRaM GawAdeH smaraRam. nanu kAryyamAtraSaktyA kaTaM svargaparyyantasTAyikAryyalABaH? ityata Aha yogyatvAcceti yAgavizayakakAryesvargasADanatvAnvaye svargaparyantasTAyitvasya yogyatArUpa tvAccetyarTaH. ataeveti yataeva praTamaM na tajjYAnamityarTaH apUrvam apUrvatvayavAhAraH. padena kriyata iti niyama iti SezaH. Saktigraheti taTA ca tAdfSaniyamo'sidDa iti BAvaH. nanvAkASAdipadasTale grAhyapadArTopasTiterhetutvasya dfzwatvAdatrApi taTetya Aha naceti. kvacit--AkASAdipade. taTA--SabdaDIhetuH. apUrveti SaktigrahAvizayIBUtetyarTaH. nanu viSizwavESizwyaboDe viSezaRatAvacCedakaprakArakaviSezaRajYAnasya hetutayA yAgavizayakakAryyavAn svargakAma iti viSizwavESizWyaboDAnuroDAdapUrbbajYAnamAvaSyakamityataAha viSizweti viSizwavESizwyaboDe'pi viSezaRatAvacCedakaprakArakajYAnameva heturnatu viSezaRavizayatvasyApi tatra praveSa ityarTaH. anyaTA--viSezaRavizayatvasyApi tatra praveSe. vyApakatayeti. jYAnena na BAta ityarTaH. tadanvayaH tadvizayatvam. tasmAt--tadIyapakzaDarmatAjYAnAt. tena rUpeReti svamate, tanmate vyApyatAvacCedakaprakArakapakzaDarmatAjYAnasyEvAnumiti hetutvAt. vyApyatvena veti mahAnasIyaDUme gfhItena DUmavyApakavahnisamAnADikaraRaDUmatvarUpeRa vahnimadanyAvfttitvarUpeRa vA vyApyAtveneyarTaH. etacca nyAyanaye paranaye vahnivyApyoDUmaH DUmavAn parvata iti jYAnAdapyanumityutpatteH vahnivyApyavAn parvata iti jYAnAdapyanuminyatpatteSceti Gyeyam. sA--sAmAnyapratyAsattiH. sutarAmiti vivfRoti kAryatvena hIti. kriyAsADAraRena--kriyAsADAraRaDarmaprakAreRa. ayogyA--sAkzAtPalajananAyogyA. yogyeti sAkzAtPalajananayogyetyarTaH. nityanizeDeti sanDyAmupAsItetyatra sanDyAvandanApUrvasya, na kalaYjaM Bakzayedityatra kalaYjaBakzaRABAvajanyApUrvasya vetyarTaH. taTA ca tavApasidDAnta iti BAvaH. ayogyatayA--sAkzAtPalajananAyogyatayA. PalASravaRAt iti nitye nizeDasTale ca PalASravaRAdityarTaH. kalpanAyAYceti PalakalpanAyAYcetyarTaH. vIjABAvAt pramARABAvAt. kAryeRa samaM--kriyArUpakAryeRa samam. aBedasyApIti yadyapi nizeDasTale kalaYjaBakzaRABAvasya kAryatvABAvena kAryatvarUpeRa liNA na tadboDasamBavastaTApi aBAvasyotpAdavinASaSAlitvanaye'BAvasyApi kAryatra samBava ityaBiprAyeRedaM DarmmatvarUpakAryatvABiprAyeRa vA. kecittu kAryatvaM kftisADyatvaM tacca yogakzemasADAraRamityaBAvasyApi kAryatvasamBava ityAhuH. kftirUpa iti sADyatvasaMsarga iti BAvaH. anvitABiDAnetiSAbdaboDetyarTaH. DarmmiRi--kAryye . kAryyatvAnvayeti svargakAma kftisADyatvAnvayetyarTaH ayogyatayA svargakAmakfti sADyatvAnyAyogyatayA. evamagre'pi. tatra Saktiriti tatra Saktigraha ityarTaH. yatprayukteti yannizWasvargakAmakftisADyatvAnvayAnupapattyetyarTaH. SaktikalpanAditi vEdikaliNmAtraSaktikalpanAdityarTaH. upAmanAdIti sanDyopAsanAdItyarTaH AdipadAnnizeDaviDisTale kalaYjaBakzaRAdyaBAvaparigrahaH. lakzaReti vEdikaliNaH kAryye DarmmiRyeva SaktikalpanAditi BAvaH. etacca lokasTale lOkika liNtvaM kAryyatvaSaktatAvacCedakamityaBiprAyeRAnyaTA tatra liNtvasya SaktatAvacCedakatve lakzaRAyA asaNgateriti Dyeyam. etaccApAtataH tannaye'pUrvasya SaktigrahAvizayatve'pi SAbdaboDavizayatvavat kriyAyA api kAryyatvarUpeRa vEdikaliNaH SaktigrahAvizayatve'pi SAbdaboDavizayatva samBavAt na hi nyAyanayaiva tanmate grAhyapadArTaSakti DIrapekzitA kintu padArTatAvacCedakarUpeRa yatra kutracidDarmmiRi SaktigrahAdeva SAbdaboDe yogyavyakterBAnam. kiYcEvamapi nizeDasTale'pUrbbAlABaH tatra kalaYjaBakzaRABAvasyApi kriyAtiriktatayA kAryyatvarUpeRa liNA tasyEva boDasamBavAt. vastutastu prakftipratyayArTa yoraBedAnvayasyAvyutpannatayA liNA kriyAderna boDasamBava ityevaM tattvam. nanu GawAdilakzaRakAryyatvasya SakyatAvacCedakatve jayetetyAdO kaTamapUrvalABaH GawAdiBinnakAryatvasya SakyatAvacCe dakatve'pUrvasyAnupasTitatvAt kutra kArye Saktigraha ityata Aha GawAdistviti. uBayaTApIti GawAdiBinnakAryatvasya GawAdikAryatvasya ca SakyatAvacCedakatve ityarTaH. kintu kAryatvameva SakyatAvacCedakamiti BAvaH. nanu sAmAnyataH kAryatvapya SakyatAvacCedakatve yajetetyA/viDidO GawAderapi SAbdaboDe mAnApattirityata AhAnviteti ayogyatayA--DAtvarTAnvayAyogyatayA. nanvevaM kAryatvena GawAderapi SakyatvAttatrApi liNaH kadAcit prayogaH syAdityata Aha viDIti kevalasya--DAtvasamaBivyAhftasya tasya--viDipratyayasya, aprayogAdiveti asADutvAdevetyarTaH. aprayegaH viDi pratyAyAdGawAderaprayogaH. prayogopADIti SamipramAjanyaSAbdaboDe'BAvasambanDena pratibanDaktyarTaH. tAdfSaboDe'purvatvaM kAraRamiti paryyavasito'rTaH. pratipattiH SakyapratipattiH. tadeva tatreti tadvftti tadeveti yojanA Saktyavftti tadevetyarTaH taTA ca tatpadaSakya vattitve sati t padajanyopasTitiprakAratvaM tatpadapravfttinimittatvamiti lakzaRaM Palitam. Avfterapi gopadAdijanyapratItO gavAdyaMSe svasamavAyisamavetatvasambanDena prakAratvAttatrAtivyAptivAraRAya satyantam. Akftistu avayavasaMyogaviSezarUpA na gopadaSak yavfttiH svamasAvayisamavetatvalakzaRaparamparAsambanDasya vfttyaniyAmakatvAt. vfttyaniyAmakasambanDena tu na kopi DarmmaH kutrApi SakyatAvacCedakaH paSupadAderapi lomavallANgUlAdisamavetatvAdikameva SakyatAvacCedakaM na tu samavetatvasambanDena lomavallANgUlAdikam. tadAdipadAt kadAcit parasparAsambanDena kapAlatvAdiprakAreRa GawAdiboDastu lakzaRayEva, Akfterapi dravyAdipadaSakyavfttitTAt. tatpadeti na cAkfterapi kAlikAdisambanDena SAkyagavAdivfttitvAdativyAptistadavasTeti vAcyaM tatpadaSaktiviSezyatAvacCedakatAniyAmakasambanDena tatpadaSaktimuKyaviSezyavfttitvasya vivakzitatvAt muKyetyupAdAnAt mUrttAdipade parimARatvAdeH, GawAdipade AkftivfttyAntarajAteH SakyatAvacCedakatvavyudAsaH. jYAnavizayASaktavastvAdipade jYAnasyApi SaktimuKya viSezyatayA jYAnatvasya SakyamuKyavfttitve'pi na yaTokta sambanDena tadvfttitvam. nacAkASAderapi AkASAdipada SakyatAvacCedakatvApattiriti vAcyaM navyamate GawatvAderGawAdipadaSakyatAvacCedakatvavadAkASAderapyAkASAdipadaSakyatAvacCedakatve izwApatteH. sampradAyamate cAkASAdipadaSakterviSezyAMSe nirvikalpakarUpatayA viSezyatAvacCedakatAniyAmakasambanDAprasidDyEvAtivyAptiriharAt, avayavAvayavivAcidaDyAdipade daDyAdeH SakyatAvacCedakatvavAraRAya viSezyadalam. upasTitirhi lakzaRASaktiBramAjanyatvena viSezaRIyA tena lakzyatAvacCedake nAti prasaNgaH. na ca samUhAlambanamAdAyAtiprasaNga iti vAvyaM yatprakArtAGawitaDarmmAvacCedena tatpadajanyatvaM tattvasya vivakzitatvAditi nigarvaH. tatpadaSaktiviSezyatAvacCedakaYca tatpadapavfttinimittatvaM saMsTAnaYca gurunaye, navya nEyAyikanaye ca samamiti na tatrAtivyAptiriti tu jyAyaH. sAsnAdO sAsnAsamavetatvAdO taTA--yaTokta lakzaRASraya. tadboDasya tatprakArakajYAnasya apravarttakatvAt SaktyA'janakatvAt GawAdipadasyeti SezaH. nanu lOkikaliNaH kAryatve SaktiH vEdikaliNaH kArye DarmiRi SaktirityaByupagame lOkikaliNatvavEdikaliNatvayoH. SaktatAvacCedakatve SaktatAvacCedakagOravamityataAha ataeveti SaktatAvacCedakagOravAdevetyarTaH. lAkzaRikI--kAryatve lAkzaRikI vede--vedasTale. SaktikalpanAditi liNsAmAnyasyEva SaktikalpanAdityarTaH. na ca liNamAtrasya kAryatve SaktiH vede ca kArye DarmiRi lakzaRA ityeva kiM na syAt kAryatvatyApakzayA kAryatvaviSizwasya kAryatvasya gurutvAt vinigamakABAvAcceti vAcyaM kftisADyatvarUpakAryatvApekzayA prAgaBAvapratiyogitvAdirUpasya DarmatvarUpasya vA kAryatvasya laGutvAdityamiprAyaH. vastutastu lAGavAlliNmAtrasya kftAveva SaktiH sADyatvaM saMsargaH. vede ca prAgaBAvavattvAdirUpakAryyatvASraye DarmiRi lakzaRA'stvevetyASayaH. nanu lokasTale kAryyatvarUpeRApUrvamevA'rTo'stu kiM lakzaRayetyata Aha naceti pUrbbamiti vede tu anAdiliNpravAdAdevA DyApakAnAmapUrbbAvagamAttatra tAtparyyasamBava iti BAvaH. vastuto'pUrbbaM loke bADitaM mAnABAvAdityeva drazwavyam. nanu liNaH Saktigrahe kriyABinnaDarmiRovizayatve'pi kAryatyasya kyatAvacCedakatayA kriyAyAM Saktirastyeva taTA ca loke'pi pAkaH kAryyABinna ityaBedAnvayaboDasya SaktyOpopapattO kiM lakzaRayA ityatamAha kriyAsADAraReti. lakzaREva kAryatve lakzaREva. pAkakAryetAvagamyate ityADArADeyaBAvasambanDena pAkaviSezyakakftimADyatvaprakArakAnvayapoDojAyate ityarTaH. anyaTA pravfttyanupapatte staTA ca pravarttakajYAnAnuroDAllakzaReti BAvaH. idaYcAByupagamavAdenoktaM vastutoDAtvarTapratyayArGayoraBedAnvayadoDasyAvyutpanna yaTA kriprAsADArarRaSaktAvapi SaktyAnopapattiranyaTA nityanizeDasTale'pi taTAnvayavoDasanBavAdapUrvalopApattareti Dyeyam. nanu loke pacetetyAdO liNolakzaRAyAM liNapadAt kAryatvarUpeRa pAkopasTitadvArA pAkaviSezyakakAryatvaprakArakAnyayaboDo jAyatAmiti vaktustAtparyamanupapannaM liNolakzaRayA kAryatvamAtropasTApakatvAdityataAha tatreti kAryatve kAyatvopasTitO. tAtaparyAdDIti loke lAGavAt kevalakAryatvopasTitO liNastAtparyAt kevalakAryatvaeva vfttirityarTaH nanu vftteriti anyatreti SezaH idamApAtataH lOkikatAtparyasya pumicCAniyantritatvAttatra lAGavasyA kiYcitkaratvAt. vastutastu tAtyaryasvApyAkANkzAnuroDena lakzaRAyA aByupagama ityeva tattvam. nanu taTApi yanmate vedasTale kftisADyatvarUpakAryatvASraye liNaH Saktistanmate kftisADyatvarUpakAryatvasyApi viSezaRaviDayA SakyatayA loke SaktyEva kAryatvopasTitisamBavAt kiM lakzaRayA ityata Aha tftIyAyA iti. na svatantraM Sakyamiti DarmyaMSe nirvikalpakaSaktyApatteriti BAvaH. kAryatve lakzaReti kftisADyatvarUpakAryatvaviSizwaSaktAdInAmapi tAdfSakAryatve lakzaREva ityarTaH. gatatvena--viSezaRatvena. svatantreti itarA viSezaRatayetyarTaH. tuzAnupavapatIti puroqASAya kapAlaM puroqASakapAlamiti caturTIsamAse satoti SezaH puroqASArTatayeti puroqASaprayojanakatvarUpeRetyarTaH tadanvitatveneti puroqASaprayojanakarUpapuroqASapadArTAnvitatvena, SAbdAnuBavavizayasya kapAlyasyetyarTaH. nopavApAkANkzA iti etacca jijYAsAyogyatAkANkzeti mate ekaprayojanakatvenAvagatasya prayojanAntare jijYAsAyA asamBavAnna kapAlasya kiM prayojanamiti jijYAsA samBavatIti BAvaH. svatantrakapAlopasTitaye iti puroqASaprayojanakAnanvitatvena kapAlaSAbDabudDaye ityarTaH aDizWAnalakzaReti puroqASapadasya puroqASADizWAne mfRmayapAtre lakzaRetyarTaH. evaYca puroqASADizWAnABinnakapAlena tuzAnupavapatItyanvayaboDaH puroqASasya kapAlamiti zazWItatpuruzaH, puroqASaYca tatkapAlaYceti karmaDArayo veti BAvaH. upavApaH sPowanaM yadyapyatra itaraviSezaRatayA upasTitinibanDanaM na nirAkANkzatvamapi tu prayojanAntaravattvopasTitinibanDanameveti dfzwAntadArzwAntikayormahadvEzamyameva taTApi nirAkANkzatvanivanDanalakzaRAmAtre dfzwAntaH. etaccApotataH jijYAsAyogyatAyA AkANkzyatvABAvAt Gawajanakena daRqena gAmaByAjetyatrApyevaMrUpeRa nirAkANkzAtayA'nvayaboDAnupapatteH kiYcAvAntaravAkyArTaboDapUrvakamahAvAkyArTaboDe'stve vaMrUpeRa nirAkANkzatvaM taTApi KalekapotanyAyena yugapattaTAnvayaboDe na kApyanupapattiH. vastutastu vedasTale ekaprayojanakatva viSizwasya prayojanAntare nAnvayaH. AnupUrvIBedena vyutpatti BedAt vedAnupUrvasTale taTEva vyutpatteH sakalavEdikEkavAkya tayA taTA nirRItatvAdityaDizWAnalakzaRetyeva tattvam. vyutpatti viroDa iti loke liNtvAvacCedena kriyAnizWakAryatAboDakatvamavaDAritaM vede ca kArye DarmiRi liNSaktO tadBaNga ityarTaH. loke iti liNtvAvacCedeneti SezaH. kriyAkAryyatve SaktiH kriyAviSezyakakAryyatvAnuBavajanakatA. kAryyatvamAtre iti SaktiravaDAritetyanupajyate SaktiranuBavajanakatA. na ceti vedasTale iti SezaH. Darmmantare kAryye DarmmiRi tadBaNga iti kriyAnizWakAryyatvasyEva liNA boDanAditi BAvaH. nanu taTApi lokasTale liNaH kriyAnizWakAryyatAboDakatayA prakftyarTAnvitasvArTavoDakatvaM liNtvAvacCedena sidDaM kAryye DarmmiRi SaktO ca tadBaNgaH kArye DarmmiRyeva liNarTakAryatvAnvayAdityata Aha tasmAditi lokasTale liNaH kriyAnvitakAryatA boDakatvAt ityarTaH. pratyayAnAM gfhItamiti liNpratyayatvAvacCedena gfhItamityarTaH. na tu prakftyarTAnvitatayA yAvat svArTavoDakatvamiti BAvaH. pratyayArTaSca--liNpratyayArTaSca. na viroDa iti apUrvarUpasvArTasyEva prakftyarTAnvitatvAditi BAvaH. tuzyatu durjana iti nyAyenAha astu veti. kriyAkAryatva iti kriyAkftistasyAH kAryatve tatsADyatve ityarTaH SaktatAvacCedakaYca liNatvameva vede'pi apUrvanizWakftisADyatvAvagamAditi BAvaH. nAnArTanyAyeneti haryAdipadanyAyenetyarTaH. yaTASrute'syApi nAnArTatayA nAnArTa tulyatvABiDAnasyAsaNgatatvApatteH. vede--vedasTale Darmyantare kArye DarmiRi SaktatAvacCedakantu atrApi liNtvameveti BAvaH. taTAca yaTA haryAdipadasTale ekameva haripadatvAdikaM SaktatAvacCedakaM vizRutvacandratvAdiBedena SakyatAvacCedakaYca nAnA taTEvEkameva liNtvaM SaktatAvacCedakaM SakyatAvacCedakaYca kAryatvaM kAryatvaYca dvayamiti Palito'rTaH. na ca liNtvAvacCedena kAryye Sakto, loke'pyapUrvalABApattiriti vAcyaM prAgeva samAhitatvAt tatrApUrvasya bADitatvAcceti BAvaH.“ maRikftA tu etanmataM pUrbbapakzIkftya dUzitam. tacca tataevAvaseyam. vistaraBayAnnoktam.
